verses.roman:
bhakta-gaṇe kahe,--śuna mukundera prema
nigūḍha nirmala prema, yena dagdha hema

synonyms: bhakta-gaṇe kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu informed His devotees; śuna—please hear; mukundera prema—Mukunda's love of Godhead; nigūḍha—very deep; nirmala—pure; prema—ecstatic love; yena—as if; dagdha—clarified; hema—gold.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then informed all His devotees, "Please hear about Mukunda's love of Godhead. It is a very deep and pure love and can only be compared with purified gold.
